commit message: First Calendula App commit. Added ExpandableListView library as a sub-project. The home screen menu and the daily agenda view are implemented but they are non-functional.
Added license GPL v3 and readme with the project description.
Added some classes an resources for the routines section, that is in a very initial state of construction.
Added project main ideas and goals
Update readme.md
Update readme.md
Update readme.md
Update readme.md
Implemented routine creation and creation. Routine deletion and a proper fragment lifecycle management are pending.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
Implemented routine deletion and fixed problems with fragments on screen rotation.
Created a very simple model for medicines (currently only name) and implemented insertion, edition and deletion. There are no persistence mechanisms yet.
Create a simple model for med presentation, and implemented the markup and the first page of the schedule creation view.
Improved the style of selected med presentation, and added med presentations on DummyDataGenerator
Added ShowcaseView library project and a pair of examples to test some features.
Update readme.md
Added the second page of the schedule creation view
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

Modified the second page of the schedule creation form to preserve user selection on screen rotate.
Added routine ordering and an option to remove routines from the schedule timetable.
Added fragment to third step of the schedule creation form. Added a simple schedule model and store. Changes on iml files are due to the update of AndroidStudio to the 0.3.7 version.
Added notifications utility with no real functionality yet
Added user model and utility class for managing sessions
Big refactor, update gradle, Android Studio, ADT... (ಥ‸ಥ)
First version with reminders working
Updated notification icon and added first version of delay selector
New home screen look. Added detailed view to daily agenda items. Corrected some bugs.
New look for routines, medicines and schedules activities.
Created model classes to use with ActiveAndroid ORM
Complete refactor of persistence scheme, using ActiveAndroid library for SQLite abstraction. Now it would be nice to implement a simple cache to avoid querying database.
Added navigation drawer to home screen
Testing new home layout
New home layout and navigation drawer first version
Lots of changes in the user interface.
Add iml files to gitignore
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/citiususc/calendula
Update home animations and fixed some animation related bugs.
Added detailed view of daily scheduled meds, and updated notifications accordingly
Spanish translation
Remove iml file from git
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/citiususc/calendula
Remove iml files from git
Updated ShowCaseView dependency
Corrected some bugs
Updated support library
First style update according to material design guidelines
Minor style improvements
Minor style improvements on lists and schedule creation activity
Fixed action bar behaviour on home activity and added fade animation when changing home background

Manually add 'namespace' branch from BetterPickers Fork (https://github.com/DDRBoxman/android-betterpickers)  that fixes namespace conflicts with new AppCompat v7 21.0.0 as a new module. It will be updated as soon as it becomes available as Gradle dependency.
Updated routine activity style and included time picker

Merge pull request #6 from citiususc/materialize

Merge branch with android material style updates
Fixed bug when deleting models with one to many relationships (Ex: Routine -> *ScheduleItem)
Updated style of medicines activity and fragment.
Fixed bug when hiding header scrolling fast on daily agenda view.
Improved reminders
Added tabs on home activity
Added static methods to get alarms PendingIntents
Added static methods to get alarm PendingIntents
Updated tabs style
Created EventBus to improve persistence events notification and handling.
Updated tabs animation and list items style
Small changes in style, and daily alarms update on startup
Added notification settings, and improved alarms
Allow dose fractions
Fixed order in drawer menu items
Added screenshots to readme
Added APK link
Perform an alarm rescheduling every midnight
Fix bug causing toolbar appearing under system bar on android L
Add broadcast receiver to listen BOOT_COMPLETED system event
RadialTimePicker replaced by a simpler one on devices with density lower than XHDPI (fixes #9)
Added a button to allow routine creation, and updated layout params to make dialog fit parent activity (fixes #12)
Update current date on home screen (fixes #8)
Add example data on startup if database is empty
Added some missing translations
Update background image resolutions
Prepare for release
